content.text: Do you or someone you know, want to be part of a highly capable scientific advice team who are critical to the development and delivery of technologically exciting programmes enhancing operational capabilities for the British Army -  Then consider applying to be a grade 7 scientific adviser within the Ministry of Defence.

The scientific adviser will specialise in communicating challenges, engaging with and driving areas including: artificial intelligence, human machine teaming, communication, cyber and electromagnetic activities and other related areas. The adviser will not need experience in defence nor in the specific technical areas but these will support you in being the top candidate. To be effective in the role, the science adviser will be a confident communicator who is comfortable exploring new areas of science and technology and building strong relationships. They will be able to interpret deep expertise and translate this to non-specialists and seniors in a convincing manner.
For more information including job description and how to apply, please click here
Apply before 11:55 pm on Monday 19th September 2022
